sections.heading: 6,193, imposing vicarious liability on owners-lessors of trucks is constitutional
sections.text: Bridgeford v. U-Haul Co., 195 Neb. 308, 238 N.W.2d 443 (1976) (pursuant to Laws 1993, LB 370, section 7, language from section 39-6,193 was placed in section 25-21,239).

sections.heading: not make lessee of trailer of lessor, and did not impute lessee's negligence to lessor under nonresident motor vehicle statute
sections.text: Peterson v. U-Haul Co., 409 F.2d 1174 (8th Cir. 1969).
